title: Levine Hats Sized Hickory Stripe Engineer Hat - Quality Railroad Conductor Cap
features: 100% COTTON - Lightweight 100% Cotton Denim Canvas Fabric
REINFORCED CROWN - The crown is constructed out of 1 panel of soft durable cotton reinforced with a hatband.
COTTON HAT BAND - The inside of the hat is lined with a cotton hat band for comfort, and offers a snug fit.
CLASSIC RAILROAD CAP - Traditional heavy duty cotton railroad hickory stripe cap. A classic cap with the same iconic look and feel. The perfect gift for young and old engineers at heart.
DURABILITY - This hat is wind resistant, water repellent and built to last through rugged use.
description: The same conductor or railroad train engineer hat you have seen elsewhere, but in much higher quality and better value. This cap is 100% cotton. It has hickory stripe pattern and is sized. You will need to order your hat size Medium, Large or X-Large.
